thread.title: Russia wants pragmatic relations with U.S., says Lavrov | Reuters
thread.title_full: Russia wants pragmatic relations with U.S., says Lavrov | Reuters

title: Russia wants pragmatic relations with U.S., says Lavrov | Reuters
text:
World News | Sat Feb 18, 2017 | 7:35am EST Russia wants pragmatic relations with U.S., says Lavrov left right Russia's Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov delivers his speech during the 53rd Munich Security Conference in Munich, Germany, February 18, 2017. REUTERS/Michaela Rehle 1/3 left right Russia's Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov walks before delivering his speech during the 53rd Munich Security Conference in Munich, Germany, February 18, 2017. REUTERS/Michaela Rehle 2/3 left right Russia's Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov delivers his speech during the 53rd Munich Security Conference in Munich, Germany, February 18, 2017. REUTERS/Michaela Rehle 3/3 
MUNICH Russia wants to build pragmatic relations with the United States based on mutual respect, Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said on Saturday. 
Addressing the Munich Security Conference, he also described NATO as a "Cold War institution" whose expansion had led to unprecedented tensions in Europe over the past thirty years. 
(Reporting by Vladimir Soldatkin and Shadia Nasralla; editing by John Stonestreet) Next In World News
